TopicTitle: dds4ksp and mods still using mbm post 1.0

Articles.Content: does anyone know if the converter still works ok for 1.0 theres no official thread for it and ddsloader is now defunct thanks to 1.0 intergration
dds4ksp is the conversion tool i dont need a list of tools from the now closed ddsloader thread, i need to know if the tool is still functioning properly for 1.0

dds4ksp just converts other image formats to dds, so it's quite independent of the ksp version (and in fact can be used in the same way for some other unity-based game texture files ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

The thread for the conversion program is [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98672-WIN-KSP-to-DDS-texture-converter?p=1512749&viewfull=1#post1512749)

It does work still, but it works best on mbm files since all it needs to do is flip a bit. It's a toss up on whether or not it will work for tga or png images, sometimes it works and sometimes it errors.
